id-00007.name: Belt of Brass Rings +10
id-00007.description: A leather belt decorated with brass rings that provides protection to the wearer.

id-00008.name: Magic Emerald (Lifegiving)
id-00008.description: A brilliant green emerald containing powerful healing magic.

id-00009.name: Morning Star (Air Wall)
id-00009.notes: 60% lighter than normal. Can cast MERP Wind Law Air Wall 1x/day.
id-00009.description: A beautifully crafted morning star, 60% lighter than normal, capable of summoning protective winds.

id-00011.name: Gold Armband with Garnets
id-00011.description: A golden armband set with red garnets.

id-00012.name: Rigid Leather Armor +10
id-00012.nonid_notes: This armor, made of leather with wood splints.

notes.p: This armor protects as AT 11 with a DB +10. It blends in well with vegetation of all kinds, adding +10 to all hiding attempts when in vegetation.

id-00013.name: Belt of Brass Rings +10
id-00013.notes: Grants +10 DB. Fits Elf or slender man.
id-00013.description: A suit of rigid leather armor sized for an Elf or slender man, appearing shabby but possessing magical properties.

id-00014.name: Mithril Button
id-00014.description: A small button made of mithril.

id-00015.name: Blue Cloak +10 (Invisibility)
id-00015.description: A richly-woven, man-sized blue cloak embroidered with silver stars and lined with ermine.

id-00016.name: Gold Necklace (Braided)
id-00016.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal

id-00017.name: Pearl Earrings (Pair)
id-00017.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal
id-00017.description: A matched pair of pearl earrings.

id-00018.name: Short Sword +10 (Jeweled)
id-00018.notes: Non-magical but well-crafted. Weighs only 1.5 lbs. Worth 39 gp.
id-00018.description: A beautiful short sword with a vine etched in gold and studded with jewel flowers twining around the hilt. Exceptionally light at only 1.5 pounds.

id-00019.name: Dagger +5 (Hawk Pommel)
id-00019.notes: Grants +5 OB due to superior balance. Worth 27 gp.
id-00019.description: A dagger with a silver pommel shaped like a hawk's head with emerald eyes. The blade is strong with a good edge and excellent balance.

id-00020.name: Gold Drinking Goblet (Dragon Carved)
id-00020.description: A heavy gold drinking goblet carved with pictures of dragons.

id-00021.name: Gold Brooch (Running Horse)
id-00021.description: A gold brooch depicting a running horse with mane and tail streaming behind.

id-00022.name: Dwarf Chainmail Shirt and Coif
id-00022.description: A Dwarf-sized chainmail shirt and coif.

id-00023.name: Metal Arm Greaves (Pair)
id-00023.description: A pair of metal arm greaves.

id-00025.name: Athelas (Dried, 1 dose)
id-00025.description: A leather pouch containing one dose of dried Athelas, a powerful healing herb.

id-00026.name: Shield +10 (Invisibility)
id-00026.notes: 20% lighter than normal. Casts MERP Illusions Invisibility 3x/day (affects shield only, not wielder).
id-00026.description: A shield 20% lighter than normal that can turn invisible.

id-00027.name: Garnet (Uncut, Hues)
id-00027.notes: Possessor can cast MERP Nature's Guises Hues 1x/day by grasping the stone and concentrating.
id-00027.description: A large uncut garnet with brown and green coloration that seems to be moving very slowly.

id-00028.name: Aldataur (Miniature Spear)
id-00028.notes: Speaking its name makes it full-size or miniature. Grants +10 OB and +10 RR. Animist or Ranger can cast 20 PP/day from MERP Plant Mastery and Animal Mastery spell lists while full-size.
id-00028.description: A 1-foot long miniature spear made of jet with its name 'Aldataur' (S. 'Commander of the Woods') carved on its side. When its name is spoken, it becomes full-size and functional.

id-00029.name: Mithril Ring (Ivy)
id-00029.description: A mithril ring carved like twining ivy.

id-00030.name: Golden Girdle (Holly Leaves)
id-00030.description: A golden girdle of holly leaves set with ruby berries.

id-00031.name: Quartz Wine Goblets (Set of 4)
id-00031.notes: Worth 80 gp each (320 gp for set).
id-00031.description: Four pale-blue quartz wine goblets shaped like niphredil flowers, in a velvet-lined wooden box.

id-00032.name: Steel Scepter +5 (Magic Mace)
id-00032.notes: 50% lighter than normal. Grants +5 OB as magic mace.
id-00032.description: A finely-crafted steel scepter with six flanges, functioning as a mace.

id-00033.name: Half-Plate Armor +15 (Size-Changing)
id-00033.notes: Grants +15 DB and +30 MM. 80% lighter than normal. Can change size to fit wearer by concentration.
id-00033.description: A very small suit of half-plate armor (about Hobbit-sized) that can grow or shrink to fit almost anyone who concentrates on changing its size.

id-00034.description: Green soft-leather boots with gold-thread tracery in the shape of a group of trees.
id-00034.name: Boots of Leaving +5
id-00034.notes: Can cast MERP Lofty Bridge Leaving (100ft range) 3x/day. Grants +5 DB and +5 MM to wearer.

id-00035.name: Rusted Short Sword +5 (Lockjaw)
id-00035.notes: Grants +5 OB. Rust does not affect OB. 10% of creatures struck get Lockjaw disease (paralysis begins after 8 hours, full paralysis after 1 week).
id-00035.description: A short sword hanging in shadows, covered in rust. When cleaned, the rust returns within 8 hours but does not affect the blade's effectiveness.

id-00036.name: Elven Cloak +75 (Cold Resistance)
id-00036.notes: Protected as by Nature's Ways Cold Resistance. Adds +75 to hiding while stationary, +25 if moving slowly.
id-00036.description: A large, tattered grey cloak that is actually Elven-made. It is spelled to appear tattered and hide its magical properties.

id-00037.name: Obsidian Horse Statuette
id-00037.nonid_notes: Two 3" white marble figures that appear as human fighters dressed in plate
id-00037.description: A small obsidian statuette of a running horse, packed in straw.

id-00038.name: Silver Rings with Sapphires (Pair)
id-00038.description: Two silver rings with small sapphires mounted in them.

id-00039.name: Black Pearl Necklace
id-00039.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal
id-00039.description: A necklace with a black pearl pendant.

id-00040.name: Jade Pendant (Leaf-Shaped) +5
id-00040.notes: Grants +5 bonus to hiding maneuvers when worn about the neck.
id-00040.description: A small jade pendant in the shape of a leaf, without a chain.

id-00041.name: Ivory Bust
id-00041.nonid_notes: Two 3" white marble figures that appear as human fighters dressed in plate

id-00042.name: Jeweled Dagger (Dwarf-made)
id-00042.notes: Grants +5 OB due to excellent workmanship. Worth 17 gp.
id-00042.description: A Dwarf-made dagger with excellent workmanship.

id-00044.name: Ebony Wand (Haste)
id-00044.notes: Can cast MERP Living Change Haste I 3x/day.
id-00044.description: A plain ebony wand hidden in a hollow bedpost.

id-00045.name: War Hammer +15
id-00045.description: An excellent war hammer taken from a fallen foe.

id-00046.name: Kragnifrim
id-00046.description: Orcish throwing knife (fang-knife), slightly curved. Can be used in melee or thrown.

id-00047.name: Kragashard +10
id-00047.notes: Grants +10 OB. Same size/weight as broadsword.
id-00047.description: A well-made Kragashard (Orcish sword about the size and weight of a broadsword, slightly curved to resemble a fang).

id-00048.name: Spinning Wheel +5
id-00048.notes: Adds +5 bonus to any spinning done on it. Worth 25 gp.

id-00049.name: Star Sapphires (Set of 8)
id-00049.notes: Worth 50 gp each, or 600 gp as a matched set.
id-00049.description: Eight perfectly-matched star sapphires in a velvet bag, hidden in a secret compartment.

id-00050.name: Axe of Orc-Slaying +15
id-00050.notes: Normally +15 OB. Against Orcs: +25 OB, gives second slaying critical, bestows MERP Protections Resistance (+10 to RR and DB) on wielder for duration of combat.
id-00050.description: A hand-axe with tracery on the axehead and decorative carving on the haft, hidden in a secret compartment.

id-00051.name: Turquoise Ring (Solid)
id-00051.description: A ring made of solid turquoise.

id-00052.name: Smokey Quartz Pendant
id-00052.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal
id-00052.description: A large smokey quartz pendant on a gold chain.

id-00053.name: Tiger-Eyes (Dozen)
id-00053.description: A small leather pouch holding a dozen large tiger-eye gems.

id-00054.name: Silver Tiara with Amethysts
id-00054.nonid_notes: Thin silver crown set with 3 diamonds, 5 rubies, and 11 aquamarines.
id-00054.description: A silver tiara set with five amethysts of exceptional clarity.

id-00055.name: Bear-Headed Scepter (Golden)
id-00055.description: A golden, bear-headed scepter with ruby eyes.

id-00056.name: Onyx Statue (Tree)
id-00056.nonid_notes: Two 3" white marble figures that appear as human fighters dressed in plate
id-00056.description: A 9-inch tall, intricately carved black-and-white onyx statue of a tree in a wooden box with straw packing.

id-00057.name: Pink Pearls (20)
id-00057.description: A plain bag containing 20 small, pink pearls.

id-00058.name: Copper Bracelet with Moonstone
id-00058.description: A copper bracelet with a very large, near-perfect moonstone.

id-00059.name: Mallorn-Wood Jewelry Box
id-00059.description: A jewelry box made of mallorn-wood, inlaid with gold and silver.

id-00060.name: Silver Brooch with Beryls
id-00060.nonid_notes: jade pin sculpted to depict a hummingbird
id-00060.description: A silver brooch set with five beryls in a star pattern.

id-00061.name: Gold Necklace (Plain)
id-00061.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal

id-00063.name: Jade Figurine with Gold Flowers
id-00063.nonid_notes: Two 3" white marble figures that appear as human fighters dressed in plate
id-00063.description: A figurine with jade flowers set on gold stems.

id-00065.name: Turquoise (Small, 6 gems)
id-00065.description: Six small turquoise gems in a pouch.

id-00066.name: Silver Bracelet (Tarnished)
id-00066.description: A small silver bracelet, very tarnished.

id-00068.name: Malachite Earrings (Matched Pair)
id-00068.description: A matched pair of malachite earrings in gold settings.

id-00069.name: Topaz Ring
id-00069.nonid_notes: Silver ring set with a fire opal.
id-00069.description: A topaz ring in a silver setting.

id-00070.name: Fire Opals (3)
id-00070.description: Three fire opals in a pouch.

id-00071.name: Arkasu Powder (7 doses)
id-00071.notes: Heals 4-24 hits and quadruples healing rate of major wounds. Seven applications total. Worth 168 gp.
id-00071.description: A wooden tube containing a fine, grey-brown powder - a very concentrated preparation of Arkasu. Mix with water to form a salve.

p.i: Bite accompanied by a 4th level muscle poison (variability b) or a 6th level reduction poison (variability a).

id-00001.name: Giant Spider
id-00001.subgroup: Giant Arthropods, Great Serpents, and Water Beasts

p.i: Crippling Flaw (When outside in the daytime they take 10 hits/ hour); Resistant to heat and cold attacks
20'R, feelings of despair if RR is failed.
Darkvision; Partially blinded by sunlight (-50 to all activity)
Darkvision; Dislike, but can operate normally in sunlight.
Crippling Flaw (turn to stone when exposed to direct sunlight); Resistant to heat and cold attacks.

id-00010.abilities: Notable Skills: Ride 32, Track 37, Perception 55, Bartering 67, Brewing 63
id-00010.description: Ulgar is a plain man with thinning grey hair and piercing grey eyes. Average height and weight. Despite his ordinary appearance, Ulgar is very charismatic: charming, persuasive, a dynamic leader and good speaker. He has led Ulgarstat for seven years and is respected by the townspeople for his fairness and wise decisions. Married for seventeen years with three sons and four daughters. Noted for his ability to brew top-quality beer.
id-00010.name: Ulgar Resticsard

id-00011.abilities: Notable Skills: Ride 23, Track 23, Stalk/Hide 17, Perception 32, Fletching 53
id-00011.description: Incredibly handsome, very blonde, very blue-eyed. Tall and muscular with perfect features and regal bearing. Universally loved for his exceptional good looks, sunny disposition, sweet nature, courage, and charisma. Average intelligence. Tends to stammer when stressed. Desperately in love with Currael Wessuntha and will do anything to save her from harm.
id-00011.name: Runnal Resticsard

id-00012.abilities: Notable Skills: Climb 11, Ride 16, Track 11, Stalk/Hide 17, Perception 18, Leadership 10, Herding (Handling herd animals) 35
id-00012.description: The oldest child of Wessun Fraelsen with two brothers and one sister. A farmgirl who does her share of chores. Unusually strong and agile. Tall, slender, and deceptively frail-looking. Golden hair, expressive green eyes, rose-bud complexion. Men noted for being hard-headed follow her with fatuous expressions. Quick wit and quick temper, but regains temper as quickly as she loses it. Generally sweet-natured. As devoted to Runnal as he is to her.
id-00012.name: Currael Wessuntha

id-00013.description: Tall and broad, a huge sunburned blonde. Looks like a farmer: very muscular and fairly weatherbeaten, slow to speak but usually quick to laugh. Ulgar and Wessun are old friends who have grown even closer because of the engagement of their offspring.
id-00013.name: Wessun Fraelsen

id-00014.abilities: Notable Skills: Ride 25, Pick Lock 10, Disarm Trap 15, Perception 25, Smithing 110, Woodcarving 30
id-00014.description: A very talented blacksmith and one of Ulgar's closest friends who helped found Ulgarstat. Short but extremely muscular, blonde with green eyes, very quiet but very intelligent. Owns a chain shirt and a hammer that is a family heirloom (+5 DB, +10 to all Smithing Maneuvers). Courting Ulgar's oldest daughter.
id-00014.name: Sigmar

id-00015.description: Ulgar's second son. Fair-haired and medium height. Noted for his good judgement.
id-00015.name: Guntar Resticsard

id-00016.description: Guntar's neighbor. Dark-haired and tall. Noted for his good judgement.
id-00016.name: Aescstan

id-00017.description: A tall, forbidding man in his late forties. Black hair and bushy black beard, exceptionally tall and broad. Black piercing eyes, gruff voice. Speaks quietly - as big as he is, has no need to raise his voice. Has a reputation for dealing fairly with good hirelings and harshness towards those who try to cheat him. A wealthy man who can survive the loss of this shipment, but much of his livelihood depends on shipping along the Men-i-Naugrim.
id-00017.name: Merchant Thal Eolsen

id-00018.abilities: Notable Skills: Climb 36 (no bonus to climbing walls, cliffs, or other sheer surfaces), Ride 61, Swim 21, Track 95, Ambush 35, Stalk/Hide 66, Perception 78, Foraging 40. Spell Lists: Nature's Lore, Nature's Guises. Notable Items: +15 war hammer, +10 long bow, Ring of Healing (heals 3 hits/round, 1 pt. of bleeding/round, heals any other physical damage at 10x normal rate)
id-00018.description: A burly, green-eyed, bearded redhead in his late thirties. Born in Mirkwood but lived in Laketown for twenty years. Supervised shipping for Merchant Eolsen for fifteen years. Lost his right lower leg seven years ago while protecting one of Merchant Eolsen's shipments from Orcs. Walks and rides with a wooden leg attached below his knee. Big and powerful man, even with one leg is a vicious fighter. Loyal to Merchant Eolsen and cannot be convinced to rob or betray him. Doesn't talk much but enjoys a good joke and has a surprisingly loud, hearty laugh. Enjoys a good drink but no one has ever seen him even slightly drunk. Conscientious and will attempt to rescue all goods and hirelings. Detests Trolls and wants to kill all four.
id-00018.name: Rothaar One-Leg

id-00019.abilities: Notable Skills: Climb 18, Ride 23, Stalk/Hide 10, Perception 10
id-00019.description: Rothaar's second-in-command. Unlike Rothaar, normally loquacious and witty (though not when first rescued). Like Rothaar, conscientious, loyal to Merchant Eolsen, and a fierce warrior. Taken prisoner by Trolls after being knocked unconscious. Has worked for Merchant Eolsen for seven years.
id-00019.name: Elisa

id-00020.abilities: Notable Skills: Climb 6, Ride 16, Stalk/Hide 5, Perception 5
id-00020.description: A first-level warrior on his first assignment, likely to be his last. After his encounter with the Trolls, Marluk has decided that if he survives, he will give up guarding caravans and become a farmer so he can remain dry, sleep in a bed, eat warm meals, and never see another Troll as long as he lives.
id-00020.name: Marluk

id-00021.abilities: Fradurag is average height for a Troll (10'3") but uglier than most. Tangled mat of brown hair, protuberant black eyes, grey hide, cauliflower ear, very large crooked nose, no visible neck. For a Troll, Fradurag is brilliant, capable of speaking in complete sentences and occasionally thinking. He masterminded a simple burglar alarm for their cave doorway using rustling leaves. His exceptional intelligence makes him even more dangerous than average Trolls. Notable Items: Battleaxe casts MERP Spell Defense Protection II 3x/day (Fradurag doesn't know how to use the spell)
id-00021.description: Ringleader of the Troll band. Typical Troll who loves violence and eating, frequently combining both. Extremely disagreeable, foul temper, incredibly strong. But has something most Trolls lack: a modicum of intelligence.
id-00021.name: Fradurag

id-00022.abilities: One of twin brothers. Both are 10th-level. Tumag is 10' tall. Lacks Fradurag's superior intellect and is in every way utterly terrible, hideous, violent, average Stone Troll.
id-00022.description: Twin brother (non-identical). Mother couldn't tell them apart and gave them the same name. Utterly terrible, hideous, violent, average Stone Troll.
id-00022.name: Tumag

id-00023.abilities: One of twin brothers. Both are 10th-level. This Tumag is 9'9" tall. Lacks Fradurag's superior intellect and is in every way utterly terrible, hideous, violent, average Stone Troll.
id-00023.description: Twin brother (non-identical). Mother couldn't tell them apart and gave them the same name. Utterly terrible, hideous, violent, average Stone Troll.
id-00023.name: Tumag (second)

id-00024.abilities: Not full-grown yet, only 8'3" tall. Lacks Fradurag's superior intellect and is in every way utterly terrible, hideous, violent, average Stone Troll.
id-00024.description: The youngest Troll, not full-grown. Utterly terrible, hideous, violent, average Stone Troll.
id-00024.name: Umik

id-00025.abilities: Notable Skills: Ride 36, Track 36, Ambush 4, Stalk/Hide 30, Pick Lock 5, Disarm Trap 10, Perception 45, Foraging 30. Languages: Atliduk 5, Waildith 5, Westron 5, Nahaiduk 5, Orkish 3. Notable Items: +20 Flail, +10 Chain and Greaves, +10 Shield
id-00025.description: A Beorning in his early thirties. Large, red-haired, and so hairy that though not a shape-changer, he looks bear-like at all times. Speaks in a soft grumbling growl. Has a disconcerting habit of staring at the person to whom he's speaking. Like other Beornings, hates Wargs, Trolls, Dragons, and Giants, but abhors Orcs. When little more than a toddler, his parents and brother were killed by goblins. His sister escaped with baby brother Grimbold. Killing Orcs is his personal Quest. A mercenary who will be fair about dividing treasure but is fond of money and wants his share. Uses almost all weapons with equal skill.
id-00025.name: Grimbold

id-00026.abilities: Gothkorlagzrim (Master of the Jaws) - overall commander at Ilmaryen Keep. Notable Skills: Climb 32, Ride (Warg) 25, Track 27, Stalk/Hide 15, Perception 15. Languages: Black Speech 5, Orkish 4, Westron 4, Logathig 2. Notable Items: +15 war hammer, +5 Kragashard, +5 long bow, +5 chain hauberk, +10 shield, an invisible key (Very Hard, -25, to find). Young Uruk of exceptional ambition. Lacks neither strength nor intelligence. Proud of being Gothkorlagzrim and will almost certainly fight to the death (88% will not flee). Frequently (01-65) uses both war hammer and Kragashard together, leaving shield slung on back.
id-00026.description: Seventh level Uruk Gothkorlagzrim of the Blogrum-hai. Almost the opposite of Marlurg - young, ambitious, strong, and intelligent. Wears full chain hauberk (Ch/16) and carries shield. Prefers to use the excellent war hammer he took from a fallen foe, but also uses Kragashard and long bow. Frequently fights with both hammer and sword together. Will almost certainly fight to the death to maintain his title (88% chance will not flee the keep).
id-00026.name: Yagrash

id-00027.abilities: Korlagzrim-gottul (Lieutenant of the Jaws) - commands 2+ Korlagzrim. Notable Skills: Climb 30, Track 10, Stalk/Hide 10, Perception 5. Languages: Orkish 5, Black Speech 2, Westron 3. Notable Items: +10 Kragashard, +5 chain shirt and greaves, +5 shield. Old for an Orc but still quite strong. A little dull mentally even for an Orc; his rise has been slow but he has sufficient cunning to hold any position he attains. Believes discretion is the better part of valor and will not hesitate to flee if hopeless. Carries eight Kragnifrim instead of the usual four.
id-00027.description: Fifth level Lesser Orc Korlagzrim-gottul of the Blogrum-hai. Old for an Orc but still quite strong. Wears chain shirt with arm and leg greaves (Ch/14) and carries shield. Armed with an especially well-made Kragashard and carries eight Kragnifrim (instead of usual four). Will always try to use throwing knives first, then close for battle (or flee if appropriate).
id-00027.name: Marlurg

id-00028.abilities: Korlagz-drartul (Sergeant of the Jaw) - leader of a Korlagz (5-Orc unit). Proficient with Kragnifrim (throwing knives). The newest of the four Lesser Orc sergeants, not remarkable.
id-00028.description: Third level Lesser Orc Korlagz-drartul of the Blogrum-hai. Wears chain shirt with arm and leg greaves (Ch/14) and carries shield. Armed with Kragashard and carries four Kragnifrim (fang-knives - slightly curved throwing knives). Not particularly remarkable among the sergeants.
id-00028.name: Bokdankh

id-00029.abilities: Korlagz-drartul (Sergeant of the Jaw) - leader of a Korlagz (5-Orc unit). Proficient with Kragnifrim (throwing knives). Disgusting even by Orc standards.
id-00029.description: Third level Lesser Orc Korlagz-drartul of the Blogrum-hai. Wears chain shirt with arm and leg greaves (Ch/14) and carries shield. Armed with Kragashard and carries four Kragnifrim. Disgusting even by Orc standards - his room requires a 2nd level RR against poison or be nauseated (-5 to activity) while in the room.
id-00029.name: Skoralg

id-00030.abilities: Korlagz-drartul (Sergeant of the Jaw) - leader of a Korlagz (5-Orc unit). Proficient with Kragnifrim (throwing knives). Neat for an Orc, keeping even his clothes semi-clean.
id-00030.description: Third level Lesser Orc Korlagz-drartul of the Blogrum-hai. Wears chain shirt with arm and leg greaves (Ch/14) and carries shield. Armed with Kragashard and carries four Kragnifrim. Tidier than most Orcs, keeping his room and clothes relatively clean.
id-00030.name: Fektalgh

id-00031.abilities: Korlagz-drartul (Sergeant of the Jaw) - leader of a Korlagz (5-Orc unit). Proficient with Kragnifrim (throwing knives). Has a penchant for knife throwing - practices constantly and receives +10 OB when using Kragnifrim.
id-00031.description: Third level Lesser Orc Korlagz-drartul of the Blogrum-hai. Wears chain shirt with arm and leg greaves (Ch/14) and carries shield. Armed with Kragashard and carries four Kragnifrim. Has a penchant for knife throwing - practices with his Kragnifrim constantly. Uses a straw-stuffed bag as a target in his room.
id-00031.name: Hagrakh

id-00032.abilities: Korlagz-drartul (Sergeant of the Jaw) - leader of an Uruk Korlagz (5-Orc unit). Proficient with Kragnifrim (throwing knives). Essentially interchangeable with Gormuk. Neither has any particular distinguishing characteristics.
id-00032.description: Fourth level Uruk Korlagz-drartul of the Blogrum-hai. Wears chain shirt with arm and leg greaves (Ch/14) and carries shield. Armed with Kragashard and carries four Kragnifrim. Essentially interchangeable with Gormuk - neither has particular distinguishing characteristics.
id-00032.name: Ukrish

id-00033.abilities: Korlagz-drartul (Sergeant of the Jaw) - leader of an Uruk Korlagz (5-Orc unit). Proficient with Kragnifrim (throwing knives). Essentially interchangeable with Ukrish. Neither has any particular distinguishing characteristics.
id-00033.description: Fourth level Uruk Korlagz-drartul of the Blogrum-hai. Wears chain shirt with arm and leg greaves (Ch/14) and carries shield. Armed with Kragashard and carries four Kragnifrim. Essentially interchangeable with Ukrish - neither has particular distinguishing characteristics.
id-00033.name: Gormuk

p.i: Darkvision; Partially blinded by sunlight (-50 to all activity)
Darkvision; Partially blinded by sunlight (-50 to all activity)
Darkvision; Dislike, but can operate normally in sunlight.

description.p: Treasure found in the Spider's refuse pile - remains of their victims

id-00001.name: Belt of Brass Rings +10
id-00001.notes: Grants +10 DB. Fits Elf or slender man.
id-00001.description: A suit of rigid leather armor sized for an Elf or slender man, appearing shabby but possessing magical properties.

id-00002.name: Magic Emerald (Lifegiving)
id-00002.description: A brilliant green emerald containing powerful healing magic.

id-00003.name: Morning Star (Air Wall)
id-00003.notes: 60% lighter than normal. Can cast MERP Wind Law Air Wall 1x/day.
id-00003.description: A beautifully crafted morning star, 60% lighter than normal, capable of summoning protective winds.

id-00005.name: Gold Armband with Garnets
id-00005.description: A golden armband set with red garnets.

description.p: Additional coins found in the refuse pile
Contents of Umik's locked chest in his bedchamber

id-00007.name: Rigid Leather Armor +10
id-00007.nonid_notes: This armor, made of leather with wood splints.

notes.p: This armor protects as AT 11 with a DB +10. It blends in well with vegetation of all kinds, adding +10 to all hiding attempts when in vegetation.

id-00008.name: Mithril Button
id-00008.description: A small button made of mithril.

description.p: Items found beside the left pallet in Tumag and Tumag's chamber

id-00009.name: Blue Cloak +10 (Invisibility)
id-00009.description: A richly-woven, man-sized blue cloak embroidered with silver stars and lined with ermine.

description.p: Contents of wooden box beside the right pallet

id-00010.name: Gold Necklace (Braided)
id-00010.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal

id-00011.name: Silver Bracelet (Tarnished)
id-00011.description: A small silver bracelet, very tarnished.

id-00013.name: Pearl Earrings (Pair)
id-00013.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal
id-00013.description: A matched pair of pearl earrings.

description.p: Pile of trinkets beside the left pallet

id-00015.name: Jade Figurine with Gold Flowers
id-00015.nonid_notes: Two 3" white marble figures that appear as human fighters dressed in plate
id-00015.description: A figurine with jade flowers set on gold stems.

description.p: Coins in iron cauldron between the beds
Contents of the unlocked cedar chest beside Fradurag's bed

id-00017.name: Dagger +5 (Hawk Pommel)
id-00017.notes: Grants +5 OB due to superior balance. Worth 27 gp.
id-00017.description: A dagger with a silver pommel shaped like a hawk's head with emerald eyes. The blade is strong with a good edge and excellent balance.

id-00018.name: Gold Drinking Goblet (Dragon Carved)
id-00018.description: A heavy gold drinking goblet carved with pictures of dragons.

description.p: Contents of the locked oak chest beside Fradurag's bed (key required or screaming trap)

id-00019.name: Gold Brooch (Running Horse)
id-00019.description: A gold brooch depicting a running horse with mane and tail streaming behind.

id-00020.name: Dwarf Chainmail Shirt and Coif
id-00020.description: A Dwarf-sized chainmail shirt and coif.

id-00021.name: Metal Arm Greaves (Pair)
id-00021.description: A pair of metal arm greaves.

id-00023.name: Athelas (Dried, 1 dose)
id-00023.description: A leather pouch containing one dose of dried Athelas, a powerful healing herb.

description.p: Small leather pouch hidden under Fradurag's pillow

id-00024.name: Short Sword +10 (Jeweled)
id-00024.notes: Non-magical but well-crafted. Weighs only 1.5 lbs. Worth 39 gp.
id-00024.description: A beautiful short sword with a vine etched in gold and studded with jewel flowers twining around the hilt. Exceptionally light at only 1.5 pounds.

description.p: The trapped chest in the Treasure Room - contains vast wealth but protected by Na-del gas trap (Lvl 5 spider venom)

id-00025.name: Turquoise Ring (Solid)
id-00025.description: A ring made of solid turquoise.

id-00026.name: Smokey Quartz Pendant
id-00026.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal
id-00026.description: A large smokey quartz pendant on a gold chain.

id-00027.name: Tiger-Eyes (Dozen)
id-00027.description: A small leather pouch holding a dozen large tiger-eye gems.

id-00028.name: Silver Tiara with Amethysts
id-00028.nonid_notes: Thin silver crown set with 3 diamonds, 5 rubies, and 11 aquamarines.
id-00028.description: A silver tiara set with five amethysts of exceptional clarity.

id-00029.name: Bear-Headed Scepter (Golden)
id-00029.description: A golden, bear-headed scepter with ruby eyes.

id-00030.name: Onyx Statue (Tree)
id-00030.nonid_notes: Two 3" white marble figures that appear as human fighters dressed in plate
id-00030.description: A 9-inch tall, intricately carved black-and-white onyx statue of a tree in a wooden box with straw packing.

id-00031.name: Pink Pearls (20)
id-00031.description: A plain bag containing 20 small, pink pearls.

id-00032.name: Shield +10 (Invisibility)
id-00032.notes: 20% lighter than normal. Casts MERP Illusions Invisibility 3x/day (affects shield only, not wielder).
id-00032.description: A shield 20% lighter than normal that can turn invisible.

id-00033.name: Garnet (Uncut, Hues)
id-00033.notes: Possessor can cast MERP Nature's Guises Hues 1x/day by grasping the stone and concentrating.
id-00033.description: A large uncut garnet with brown and green coloration that seems to be moving very slowly.

id-00034.name: Aldataur (Miniature Spear)
id-00034.notes: Speaking its name makes it full-size or miniature. Grants +10 OB and +10 RR. Animist or Ranger can cast 20 PP/day from MERP Plant Mastery and Animal Mastery spell lists while full-size.
id-00034.description: A 1-foot long miniature spear made of jet with its name 'Aldataur' (S. 'Commander of the Woods') carved on its side. When its name is spoken, it becomes full-size and functional.

description.p: The chest in the Treasure Room with invisible key - contents appear empty due to illusion but can be felt

id-00036.name: Gold Necklace (Plain)
id-00036.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal

id-00037.name: Copper Bracelet with Moonstone
id-00037.description: A copper bracelet with a very large, near-perfect moonstone.

id-00038.name: Mallorn-Wood Jewelry Box
id-00038.description: A jewelry box made of mallorn-wood, inlaid with gold and silver.

id-00039.name: Silver Brooch with Beryls
id-00039.nonid_notes: jade pin sculpted to depict a hummingbird
id-00039.description: A silver brooch set with five beryls in a star pattern.

id-00040.name: Mithril Ring (Ivy)
id-00040.description: A mithril ring carved like twining ivy.

id-00041.name: Golden Girdle (Holly Leaves)
id-00041.description: A golden girdle of holly leaves set with ruby berries.

id-00042.name: Quartz Wine Goblets (Set of 4)
id-00042.notes: Worth 80 gp each (320 gp for set).
id-00042.description: Four pale-blue quartz wine goblets shaped like niphredil flowers, in a velvet-lined wooden box.

id-00043.name: Steel Scepter +5 (Magic Mace)
id-00043.notes: 50% lighter than normal. Grants +5 OB as magic mace.
id-00043.description: A finely-crafted steel scepter with six flanges, functioning as a mace.

id-00044.name: Half-Plate Armor +15 (Size-Changing)
id-00044.notes: Grants +15 DB and +30 MM. 80% lighter than normal. Can change size to fit wearer by concentration.
id-00044.description: A very small suit of half-plate armor (about Hobbit-sized) that can grow or shrink to fit almost anyone who concentrates on changing its size.

id-00045.description: Green soft-leather boots with gold-thread tracery in the shape of a group of trees.
id-00045.name: Boots of Leaving +5
id-00045.notes: Can cast MERP Lofty Bridge Leaving (100ft range) 3x/day. Grants +5 DB and +5 MM to wearer.

description.p: Three silver rings inside the mallorn-wood jewelry box (18 sp each)
The room with the rusted short sword

id-00047.name: Rusted Short Sword +5 (Lockjaw)
id-00047.notes: Grants +5 OB. Rust does not affect OB. 10% of creatures struck get Lockjaw disease (paralysis begins after 8 hours, full paralysis after 1 week).
id-00047.description: A short sword hanging in shadows, covered in rust. When cleaned, the rust returns within 8 hours but does not affect the blade's effectiveness.

description.p: Contents of Marlurg's double-locked chest (two keys required)

id-00048.name: Obsidian Horse Statuette
id-00048.nonid_notes: Two 3" white marble figures that appear as human fighters dressed in plate
id-00048.description: A small obsidian statuette of a running horse, packed in straw.

id-00049.name: Silver Rings with Sapphires (Pair)
id-00049.description: Two silver rings with small sapphires mounted in them.

id-00050.name: Black Pearl Necklace
id-00050.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal
id-00050.description: A necklace with a black pearl pendant.

id-00051.name: Elven Cloak +75 (Cold Resistance)
id-00051.notes: Protected as by Nature's Ways Cold Resistance. Adds +75 to hiding while stationary, +25 if moving slowly.
id-00051.description: A large, tattered grey cloak that is actually Elven-made. It is spelled to appear tattered and hide its magical properties.

description.p: Contents of Yagrash's trapped chest (three spring-loaded blades)

id-00052.name: Malachite Earrings (Matched Pair)
id-00052.description: A matched pair of malachite earrings in gold settings.

id-00053.name: Topaz Ring
id-00053.nonid_notes: Silver ring set with a fire opal.
id-00053.description: A topaz ring in a silver setting.

id-00054.name: Fire Opals (3)
id-00054.description: Three fire opals in a pouch.

id-00055.name: Arkasu Powder (7 doses)
id-00055.notes: Heals 4-24 hits and quadruples healing rate of major wounds. Seven applications total. Worth 168 gp.
id-00055.description: A wooden tube containing a fine, grey-brown powder - a very concentrated preparation of Arkasu. Mix with water to form a salve.

description.p: Contents of Skoralg's chest with poison needle trap (Uraana, 6th-level poison)

id-00057.name: Jade Pendant (Leaf-Shaped) +5
id-00057.notes: Grants +5 bonus to hiding maneuvers when worn about the neck.
id-00057.description: A small jade pendant in the shape of a leaf, without a chain.

description.p: Contents of Fektalgh's locked chest (key hidden under loose stone)
Contents of Hagrakh's locked chest

id-00059.name: Ivory Bust
id-00059.nonid_notes: Two 3" white marble figures that appear as human fighters dressed in plate

id-00060.name: Jeweled Dagger (Dwarf-made)
id-00060.notes: Grants +5 OB due to excellent workmanship. Worth 17 gp.
id-00060.description: A Dwarf-made dagger with excellent workmanship.

description.p: Contents hidden in false bottom of Ukrish's chest

id-00061.name: Turquoise (Small, 6 gems)
id-00061.description: Six small turquoise gems in a pouch.

description.p: Items hidden in hollow bedpost in Gormuk's room

id-00062.name: Ebony Wand (Haste)
id-00062.notes: Can cast MERP Living Change Haste I 3x/day.
id-00062.description: A plain ebony wand hidden in a hollow bedpost.

description.p: Contents of Bokdankh's locked chest

id-00075.nonid_notes: Gold necklace that holds a large white opal

id-00080.description: A golden girdle of holly leaves set with ruby berries.

id-00082.notes: 50% lighter than normal. Grants +5 OB as magic mace.
id-00082.description: A finely-crafted steel scepter with six flanges, functioning as a mace.

id-00083.notes: Grants +15 DB and +30 MM. 80% lighter than normal. Can change size to fit wearer by concentration.

description.p: Chest in the Secret Cellar #50 with false bottom containing the Axe of Orc-Slaying

id-00085.name: Axe of Orc-Slaying +15
id-00085.notes: Normally +15 OB. Against Orcs: +25 OB, gives second slaying critical, bestows MERP Protections Resistance (+10 to RR and DB) on wielder for duration of combat.
id-00085.description: A hand-axe with tracery on the axehead and decorative carving on the haft, hidden in a secret compartment.

description.p: Velvet bag hidden in secret compartment in headboard of master bed

id-00086.name: Star Sapphires (Set of 8)
id-00086.notes: Worth 50 gp each, or 600 gp as a matched set.
id-00086.description: Eight perfectly-matched star sapphires in a velvet bag, hidden in a secret compartment.

description.p: The spinning wheel in the Sitting Room #44

id-00087.name: Spinning Wheel +5
id-00087.notes: Adds +5 bonus to any spinning done on it. Worth 25 gp.

description.p: Goods being prepared for shipment to Dol Guldur - cloth, tapestries, ore, meats, weapons, armor, grains, honey, beer, mead, and arrows. Not all may be easily portable.
Typical wealth carried by a single Lesser Orc Kragashi warrior
Typical wealth carried by a single Uruk Kragashi warrior
